website_summaries.verdict: Very stylish type of diaper bag that ships with a few other matching pieces for organization.
pros: Includes plenty of space that you can fill with all of the items you need during the day for the baby
Top will zip closed to keep gear protected
Has an insulated zippered bottle bag to keep milk cold
Has a very nice design and color that you'll love to carry
cons: Material may not last as long as you'd like to see

customer_reviews.title: Not just a diaper bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use as a "teacher" bag and it works perfectly! All the pockets on the inside ar fantastic and hold things like my sticky notes, wallet, sunglasses, and other odds and ends. It's big enough to fit my laptop, notebooks, pencil bag, agenda, and more. The pockets on the outside are perfect for my travel mugs too! I think the best thing about this bag is that it's water resistant and it zips close! And not to mention really cute too! I Would highly recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: One of the smaller bags had a dirty spot that would not clean off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use as a breast pump bag for the Spectra S2. Everything fits perfectly, and there is still plenty of space to spare. One of the smaller bags had a dirty spot that would not clean off, and I emailed the seller about it, and I got a response the same day. They sent out a replacement for it free of charge, and I received it 2 days later. It's in perfect condition. And the bag itself is really cute, and I'll probably use it as an oversized purse when I'm no longer using it for the pump. Overall, excellent purchase, and I would absolutely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Strebel

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing and now I’m returning it and won’t buy this brand again due to not knowing if the quality will be good or not
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this diaper bag and the second I opened it and looked inside I noticed the inside lining was already torn. Very disappointing and now I’m returning it and won’t buy this brand again due to not knowing if the quality will be good or not.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The item specification were accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The bag was comfortable and the specifications on it were accurate. Similar items we viewed at local stores were 40-70% higher and didn’t have all the same items. Bag is more than comfortable without sacrificing the look. The side straps make it easy to hang on stroller or shopping cart. Over all very satisfy.
customer_reviews.author: Herman Perez

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different bag.
customer_reviews.text: There is no structure to this bag at all and the handles will easily make your arm sore. I've been wanting this bag for two years now and finally got it. I am so disappointed. I don't know how the regular price is around $90, it's barely even worth the $30 sale price. Material will likely hold up well in a spill though, and there is a lot of room, but it will lose its shape once full.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Perfect for my newborn, toddler, and two older kids and all their crap. Holds everything, keeps it organized, and all the little bags have come in handy, too. I use the stroller straps all the time. I love the matching changing pad, but wish it were just a tad bigger. The whole set wipes clean easily and I love the color and pattern. I can see this becoming my beach bag once the baby is old enough to use a smaller bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I just got my bag and I love it! It's the perfect size. Not too big or too small. It's fits everything I need for baby and me. The extra bags are so convenient. I can load one up with toys for baby and then just grab it out when needed. No more shuffling around the bag through diapers to find that toy. Or have one ready with a diaper and small pack of wipes so I can just grab that out and go to change baby without bringing the whole bag with. Love that it straps onto the stroller and it's a light weight bag. Definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The best diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I am on my 3rd baby, this is the best bag I have ever gotten. I love the extra bags it came with. And the material is easy to give a quick clean up. I wasn’t super excited about the print of stripes. But when it arrived I loved it. It’s not too feminine, so my husband doesn’t mind carrying it. And it not “all boy” so I may continue to use it for other things when we don’t need it as a diaper bag anymore. Love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great value, made for 1 kid use or light use
customer_reviews.text: For the price you really get what you pay for. I love the bag and all the extra little bags, inserts, etc it comes with but the main bag needs to be more durable as my inseams are ripping in 3 different places after 6 mo daily use. Considering getting a stronger basic big bag (for 2 kids, perhaps I overstuffed the other bag) but keep using all the wonderful inserts etc from this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chicachi

customer_reviews.title: Roomy with lots of pockets to organize
customer_reviews.text: I got this to travel on an airplane. It fit all of our necessities easily. The pockets were very helpful for keeping all our tickets and documents in easy to access places. I love having the organizing bags with it, though I haven't used all of them. My only critique is I wish there was a leather-type bottom since the bag will be set down on the ground and this can only be spot cleaned. I really wanted to wash this bag after we returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's wrought EVERY  $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Oh waw love the bag Lots of space yes yes I have 10 outfit in there 35 diapers 2 glass bottles 1 receiving blanket a box of gloves in the small bag I have 3 new born outfit in there So to call it a BABY bag is an under statement love it ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Get 'More' Than What You Paid For!
customer_reviews.text: I took a very long time searching Amazon's inventory on various Diaper Bags. This particular Diaper Bag just gave me more mileage for my dollar! It's absolutely roomy for all that I need to put in it. Folks, this Diaper Bag can be used for anything! For Example= If you have medical issues that require you to carry various items to secure your medical needs, this is a must have tote.
customer_reviews.author: T.L Burval

customer_reviews.title: The bag is great
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a dog bag for an on the go vet trip, a walk away from the house, or for trips. If this was being used as a diaper bag then I probably wouldn't use all of the extras that go with it because only half of them are big enough to fit things in. Love overall, nice quality, roomy, perfect for a bunch of things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. And I’ve been through a lot of bags. Well made, just enough pockets, easy closure, two zipper pockets on the outside front, no chemical stink. Came with a lot of extras, I typically throw out the extra little changing mat and what not because they are usually so cheaply made but I actually kept this one and the other goodies it came with.
customer_reviews.author: A Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! I was tired of carrying the big backpack when I needed to make a short trip. I use this when we are running to the store or going to church so I don't have to lug around ALL the stuff! Still fits his drink and snacks some toys and diapers and a change of clothes with room to spare. I am also pleased with the style and material. Its also nice that it came with all the extra pouches even though I don't really need them. I will definitely find some use for them!
customer_reviews.author: Alena Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Loving my soho diaper bag! It’s perfect for my 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: In LOVE with my new diaper bag ! It fits everything I need ! Love the smaller matching bags(makes it look very pretty and I found them each very useful! I keep everything I need organized I know exactly where to look for if I need formula ,bottles medicine,clothes,blanket,snacks.. I can fit everything I need for a day out (or two) , for my newborn and toddler all in this bag ! It’s also nice to be able to hang it on the Stroller with the extra straps a big plus. Great price! Definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: jazzmine Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is big but not too big and fits a lot of things in it. Right now I have it packed for the hospital for my baby due in 2 weeks but I’m sure it will plenty accommodate for my toddler and newborn! It comes with a lot of smaller bags and stroller clips which is very convenient! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sudduth

customer_reviews.title: Chemicals in fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with the bag, it has plenty of space for baby items, it looks beautiful as in the picture, and it has small bags to use... However, after washing it and using it for 3 months, it still has a very strong chemical smell that gives me headache. For this price, the bag should be made of safe fabric and foam... I'm disappointed that a bag that's used for baby food (etc.) has strong unsafe chemicals in its fabric!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christia

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not super durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this diaper bag as my primary bag for about 6 months now. It has plenty of room for the essentials for a breastfeed infant and a toddler, but would probably be small if I had to tote formula & bottles in addition to sippy cups and snacks. I like the configuration of the pockets, as well, and the stroller straps are very convenient. My biggest disappointment is that this bag is already starting to come apart after only 6 months. The stitching has come out need one of the front zippers and that area is now frayed and worn looking (see photo). I guess you get what you pay for with a bargain bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nursery Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Black spots all over the bag. Manufacturer defect.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I loved this diaper bag. It’s light weight, neutral, and super cute. I love all the pockets inside and the extra small bags to put clothes and stuff in. However, after only a little over two months the bag has got black stuff all over it that will not come out. At first it showed up on the very bottom, I figured maybe it got wet and was mold. Then it started coming up on the top part of the bag. I tried light cleaner, washing, etc and they will not come off. I’m afraid it’s something with the manufacturerer. Possibly the spray they use on the fabric. I love the bag but I’m highly dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It just look beautiful, but the material is very bad
customer_reviews.text: It just look beautiful, but the material is very bad, my girl has 8 month and none of these work property, the big bag get broke and the rest get the color that you see in the pictures, I waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Snaitheling

customer_reviews.title: Great nag
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bag! And it really looks nice. I bought this for my 2 year old dog’s bag, to store jackets, water, food, food and water, dishes , toys, leashes etc when we travel. Perfect for carrying my little buddies needs
customer_reviews.author: Poohgus

customer_reviews.title: Mom loved it for her nesting preparing for a newborn!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my mom as a baby shower gift and she loves it. Super convenient and pretty. I warned her about the side strap that was reported to tear so she can reinforce it if she wants. Also, the stroller straps, totally mind blown. Love that idea! Even if it does tear after a long time, totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but not the best construction
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bag. I got it to use as a purse mainly, for when I nanny. I like having a big bag with lots of storage. But there was fraying on the straps when I got it. Nothing too bad, just a few loose threads. But it is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Green stripes, not gray
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this bag because it was such a great price and came with organizing accessories. I had to return it though because the color is so off. I expected gray stripes and they are more army green which just looked ugly.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Great quality and price! I am gonna use it for my hospital bag first so all the handy little bags will be great for organizing everything. I am impressed with the quality especially since it's so inexpensive. I'm also excited for using it as my diaper bag and having so many pockets to organize everything . So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appears like it will be a great bag!
customer_reviews.text: My baby won’t arrive for about another 3 weeks yet, so I haven’t fully employed our new bag. I have started to pack it up in preparation for our first outings. I love the style/look of the bag. The materials seem like they’ll be easy to clean. Lots of pockets, which is great. I love all the extra bags that came with. Still deciding which to utilize for what, but it’s great to have so many options!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a relative because it was supposed to be 7pieces and only received the diaper bag...very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this diaper bag! It’s a great size. Comes with perfect additives, I actually use one of the added bags as my main purse now. And it looks very nice. Compared to the bags I was looking to buy in store, I’m glad I’m went with this. I’ve seen some reviews that say they have issues with stitching unraveling or discoloring of the bags- I haven’t experienced that at all. Also love the straps that connect to the stroller. It’s much more convenient than having to place the bag in the under basket
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Nice but on the small side.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my second baby. I was really hoping it would be bigger than my current bag. I have a Carter's bag that I got with my first baby. I love the look of this bag and it does have plenty of pockets it just really isn’t big enough for all the diapers clothes etc. of both a newborn and a 2yr old. So I’m simply disappointed in the size.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hebert

customer_reviews.title: The best diaper-bag I’ve ever brought
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag, I’ve had really expensive brands and got fed up and the quality was no where as good as this one ! I love the storage bags that come with it and the quality of this bag is absolutely amazing I was blown away especially since it’s very affordable! You would be very happy with your purchase! You won’t regret it ! If your thinking about getting this bag you might as well do so !!! We love it and it’s so convenient and it makes it easy to organize!
customer_reviews.author: jus-cuz-Liz

customer_reviews.title: I like this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag every time we go out. I don't use all the small bags, but I really like the largest one. It fits in the side pocket perfectly and is the right size for my wallet and phone. Any time I want to use them without the diaper bag, I pull the smaller bag out and I am ready to go. This bag is a little on the large size but of several I have, this is the one I use.
customer_reviews.author: mom of the dorm

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great and the additional smaller bags are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic! I love the smaller bags that come with it too, it makes it even more worth buying. I had a backpack diaper bag and I was over trying to blindly dig through it. This bag is big and soft and easy to see everything. It’s very pretty and I could see myself using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: All4you

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE BUT Not as big as your thinking.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this one as it compared to the Skip Hop grand central which is a decent size bag. This one I bought for 2 under 2. My purse is bigger. It’s SUPER adorable. And honestly I love the look and the bags that come with it, but it was misleading to be bigger. With 2 under 2 there’s usually a few things that are needed and this does not fit it. Honestly barely fit the stuff as a coming home from hospital bag for one.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Darby

customer_reviews.title: Major organization!!
customer_reviews.text: This fits all my needs, all of the time. Each little insert holds certain things. I always know where everything is and I always have what I need. No fumbling. Doesn’t feel big and carries well with the stroller straps. From errands to all day to road trip vacations, I fit everything for my baby, myself, and my husband. And it’s cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I COULDN’T LIVE WITHOUT IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this diaper bag!! Storage capacity exceeds all expectations. I don’t have twins but I could venture to say you would only need one of these for both. I can pack all of my stuff plus my daughters things in it, and still have room. I love that it’s really easy to clean! Most of the time it doesn’t even need scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great, Large Bag for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because of the style, size and price. It did not disappoint! Plenty of room for the things for my baby, plus a few activity books and crayons and things for my 6 yo. The side pockets are very large and the extra zipper pockets in the front are great for my personal things so I don't have to dig in the big part of the bag for my wallet, phone, etc. Only had the bag for about a week, so I am hoping it holds up well, but so far, I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Malissa I.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. The material isn't cheap or doesn't seem cheap it's easy to clean and very big inside. Makes it easier to organize and carry everything you need for your baby. Even for yourself. It was true to its description.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: not black and white like the description shows
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this bag but when I pulled it out of the box the stripes are cream and green.. not black and white like the description shows. I hate the color green, lucky for me, my sister is also having a baby and her favorite color happens to be green! Also the bottle bag in not insulated, which I was was hoping for. Otherwise it has a lot of space on the inside which is perfect and is going to be a great baby gift for my sister. I'll look elsewhere for a diaper bag for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Similar to ones I have seen in stores but much less pricey. This bag is large and roomy with plenty of pockets, plus it comes with extra smaller bag/pouches. Easy to clean, durable, and whoever came up with the stroller straps was a genius!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey McBride

customer_reviews.title: Big sturdy diaper bag with extras
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag for the price. It came with a lot of extra bags that I didn't need however. I like the diaper bag, it has a lot of space, good compartments and seems to be holding up well. It looks cute and I have gotten complements on it. Overall pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, a little smelly
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the bags included with this. The main bag is large enough to be used as a main diaper bag for 1 child but not so large that it's cumbersome to carry. All of the bags stunk of plastic upon opening. I let them air out for weeks before using them and they still have a faint odor.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: No cushion, very thin changing pad
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could love this bag and give it 5 stars, everything else looks great except one, The changing pad, way too thin, absolutely no cushion, will definitely not put a baby over this pad. Has least or no protection from surface. Instead of the other attachments that comes along with this bag soho could have provided just a quality bag with few attachments or even none but with a cushioned changing pad. Will return it.
customer_reviews.author: RsbCali

customer_reviews.title: Tote/ diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: bought this to carry as a tote more than a diaper bag, love it . It's much lighter than the tote I was carrying and I got caught in a heavy rain and everything was dry and not wet like my other tote. I would recommend this bag and it has such more room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of extra bags. Holds up with daily use
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working great! I’m using it for my diaper bag purse. It came with so many little extra bags I’m not sure what to do with them all. But it’s holding up very well to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: This was great at first. I loved it. Unfortunately in less than 2 months it has started falling apart! So disappointing. We barely use it anyway because of the pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: alisa rosado

customer_reviews.title: Great tote/purse/diaper bag combo.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag a lot, not overly "diaper bag" looking, I use this as my purse/diaper bag even if I run somewhere without the babies (cuz that happens ALL THE TIME 😂). Plenty of room inside. I have not used any of the extra little pouches that came with it, but they may come in handy to others. I love the stroller handle attachment straps, leaves the stroller basket free and its easier to get at stuff in the bag. The material wipes clean but doesn't look like the typical diaper bag material.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my bf sister haven't gave it to her yet but the quality is great and there's a lot of pockets and pieces that come with the bag that is very useful to a new mother a bottle holder a diaper changing mat all of that so it's awesome on storage space. The material is good so that stains or anything like that won't seep. Easily can wipe off anything . The design is cute and not obnoxious like most baby bags.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis tate

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mom purse
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It's the perfect size to be my toddler mom bag and carries everything I need and then some. I love the additional bags it comes with, so I can keep everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, wish it was a little bigger and deeper but it will do, can’t beat it for the price and the quality was a lot better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything and way better than other brands like skip hop and all other expensive diaper bags. This diaper bag comes with more than others and is cheaper than all of them!! It’s absolutely perfect for the day out with baby!! Thank you for not taking advantage of us working mommas with the price and for being better than 99% of the diaper bags out there!!
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It fits everything I need and then some. We use cloth diapers which are bulkier than disposables and we still have plenty of space!!! It’s big enough for every day items but doesn’t feel too big when I’m carrying it around all day! I love all the extras that come with this bag too! I don’t actually use the changing pad but it seems like it’s good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: All around good diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I have used this diaper bag for 2 months now and I love it! I have a 3yr old and a 2month old. This Soho bag will carry everything you need for both of them. I am a notorious overpacker and still have space left over. There are plenty of pockets along with the other bags included to keep everything organized. Only downside it there is no true thermal pocket to keen bottles warm. That being said the bottle holder included can keep a bottle warm for an hour or so if stuffed in the bag. (
customer_reviews.author: Gena Dussold

customer_reviews.title: Great bag with a ton of storage space!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price! It’s a really cute bag with a ton of storage space. My only complaint is the scent. Not a big deal if you don’t have a strong sense of smell like I do. Nothing a little febreeze can’t fix which is why I still gave it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Avila

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love this chic diaper bag! Can hold a lot without being bulky.The materials seem durable, including the zippers. The bag is beautiful and it's got great pockets. It's obvious they know what parents want in a bag.Received exactly as described. The design and print are beautiful. Very satisfied and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this bag! I was registered at target for my baby registry, and saw a similar bag for $90. So glad I got this one instead, it came with extra bags to keep stuff organized and even a diaper pad! Also it’s a perfect size. Great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diaper bag of my dreams
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag fits everything I need for a toddler and an infant plus has room to spare. It wipes clean easily and is really heavy duty!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bag and everything fits great in it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag for my breast pump. Everything fits perfectly. It arrived with a whole on the front pocket. Seemed that someone cut it when opening the box at the plant. I emailed the company and they said they would send a replacement right away :) Greah customer service. Very pleased with the material of the bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cfarms

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the bag! So many pockets and extra bags keep me organized! Only thing is the changing pad has trouble going in when I have all the other bags. I think I will start keeping it in the outside back pocket like one reviewer said. Super stylish too. So cute.And I love that I can strap it on to the grocery cart!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful diaper bag! Excellent quality. Used it for months now and no complaints. Easy to clean (even held up in the washer) plenty of pockets and add on pouches. Best diaper bag I’ve came across yet!
customer_reviews.author: Matcus57

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag that I could carry as a purse but also use to carry a few baby essentials. The make and size of the bag is great. I really like the internal pockets because it makes it very easy to access what I need it, when I need it. I use two of the additional bags - the mesh-topped bag for extra clothes and bibs and the small zipper bag for a few snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina H. Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for everyday
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag because it doesn't look like a diaper bag. Plenty of pockets and extra bags. Straps are longer than expected and perfect for throwing on your shoulder. The only con is the color is a little more tan and green than white and blue. I like it though. Very neutral.
customer_reviews.author: alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag, holds a lot but isn’t too big. All the little bags it comes with are good, I will say that the ‘insulated’ bottle bag, isn’t that insulated so I might have to buy separate one. Other than that it’s perfect for a diaper bag and feels pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nia Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality at a reasonable price. Makes it easy to be organized. Attractive piece.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag, it also came with a changing pad and a few other small bags. Seems water resistant and easy to clean... I do like it
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper work bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put all my pump parts and daily necessities to bring to work. Good looking, affordable, diaper work bag. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: California Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and spacious diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice and very spacious diaper bag.The quality is high and durable.As the same time its stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for moms
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect with lots of compartment. I am a new mom and this bag helped me organize all items that I needed for my daughter. Update: I no longer need another bag. Thank you for making this useful purse.
customer_reviews.author: BTG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lightweight, washable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bag, very lightweight, but not quite water repellent like I had expected. However it goes perfectly through the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in condition described. Wonderful bag with tons of storage options. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sleek design of this diaper bag, and all of the accessories included. It did start ripping at the bottom though with heavy use. Knowing this, I’d still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought the diaper bag as a gift. It appears to be well made and I am hoping that it meets the need of the infant and mother. It looks great and looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag. Not only is it great looking but it has so much room to pack all the baby things we need. It would also make a great carry on bag for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I’ve had 2 diaper backpacks and they just don’t store enough and end up being hard to wear because they’re so full. This has lots of different containers to sort things so you don’t have to dig through everything to find what you need. Straps are long enough to easily throw on your shoulder. And cute color/design. So far love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hubley

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This bag began to fall apart. Literally ripping at the seams. I had to buy another diaper bag in less than a month. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diaper bag must have
customer_reviews.text: This product really surprises me. It's super durable. And perfect material to just wipe clean. Holds plenty of items for my three kids.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Lindmeier

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously impressive for the price. I love all of the smaller bags, makes organizing super easy. This is my 4th baby and my favorite diaper bag! Stylish and big enough without looking like a suitcase. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lacie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dipper bag !
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good dipper bag ! Is really big and confortable to carry. I like that you can put it on the back of the stroller and that it has a lot of tiny bags that you can use to put different clothes or dippers on them and keep you bag organice!
customer_reviews.author: viangie

customer_reviews.title: Strap on small bag broke day 1!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, however I didnt get to even use the small bag before the strap just snapped and is hanging by a thread! I put my wallet, lip gloss and phone in it and put it over my shoulder and that was it! Pretty disappointed in that. I do think the pockets in the large bag are perfectly placed, and the extra bags are great. It also seems to be very easy to clean. I was really hoping to ditch my usual purse to avoid carrying both that and a diaper bag and just use the smaller one. But it broke before I could even use it. Bummed!
customer_reviews.author: adam dorau

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT MOMMA PURSE!
customer_reviews.text: Not only works as an AMAZING diaper bag with PLENTY of compartments, but is SO STYLISH, you don't have to give up having a "purse" 😍
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag and got a defective one at first, but I was able to have a new one sent to me as I am sending the defective one back. I love this bag so far. It looks very nice and seems pretty sturdy. My little one isn't here yet but I've been able to put all the essentials in with much space left. I wanted a diaper bag that didn't look like one so I'm pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jory

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve carried this bag for three years still in great condition! The small bags have came in use for trips and shopping when a whole bag would be too much! Thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for on the go parents
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great. The zippers are strong and all the extra bags are so useful! It is a little smaller than expected but has plenty of storage and actually turned out o be a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came with a bunch of extra stuff I didn't really need, but the bag itself is a great size and looks cute. The material is easily cleaned. I use it for both my toddler and newborn, and it holds plenty of diapers, clothes, toys and snacks. At least as functional as the SkipHop bag I used for my first diaperbag and only half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH ROOM!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so glad I got it!! I use it for a diaper bag and let me just say LOTS OF SPACE! Number 1 reason I got this bag is because of SPACE!!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is worth the price. I kept comparing prices to Walmart’s diaper bags but this one is better because you get more stuff. You get 4 little bags/pouches. Walmart bags you get none and your paying over $30.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year and broke apart. Handle fell off and bag ripped. It did go through a lot so I would buy it again. Just wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha mills

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag ! Target for 89.99!! This is they best diaper bag and I love all the extra bags it comes with for organization purposes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrah Crotty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient product. Loved it. It was actually a gift but even the would be mother loved the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anirudh Mamtora

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday. Very good product. I have 2 under 2 and this has been a great diaper bag for me.
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Great collection!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this set to my daughter, and she loves every piece!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Granger

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Did not start using it yet since our baby is due in a month. Need to test how durable it is. But it looks like made for the long run. Great bag for the price. We got it for $36 during Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Venkat

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her diapers new diaper bag. Holds sooo much. She brought it with us to busch gardens and it worked great! Awesome for everyday use and travelling. Is very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Vega Family

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. The only draw back is the stroller attachment loops are hard to put on sometimes (especially if juggling other items at the same time). We’ve been using it for 4 months and it goes everywhere with baby. Plus, there is room for all of the baby things as well as some stuff for our 3 yo and 5 yo.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hoskovec

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It look just like pic. Very trendy and has plenty of room. I like the outside pockets for personal items. It's trendy enough you don't even have to carry a separate purse ! Very happy with this purchase. Just as nice if not nicer that $70 bags at buy buy baby and those don't come with as many accessories
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth d

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I have this to my sister for a Baby Shower Gift 2 months ago. Everyone at the shower commented on how pretty it was. She uses it daily and just told me last night how much she still loves it. I'm very pleased with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S

customer_reviews.title: Gen
customer_reviews.text: use this for 1 year and a half, it is a long time for a bag that does not have so much quality in its material. It is very useful, practical but if you are looking for some years of durability as this is not.
customer_reviews.author: GENESIS

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag as part of my baby registry. It's lightweight and easy to clean. The additional compartments inside help to keep things organized and sorted.
customer_reviews.author: Lelynda P. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy standing
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I don’t like is the bag just falls into itself and it’s hard to find what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: I fit my whole backpack diaper bag in half of this bag... We're going to Disney World and I wanted more storage and something that hooked on to the stroller. This hit everything I was looking for, packing for a 2 yr old and an adult man child takes a lot of planning, this bag allowed me to have all the necessities in one bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Goos

product_meta.title: SoHo Collection, Grand Central Station 7 pieces Diaper Bag set
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :17.6 x 13.6 x 2.2 inches; 2 Pounds
 * Manufacturer recommended age :0 months and up
 * Item model number :sohoHYT823
 * Date First Available :October 1, 2015
 * Manufacturer :SoHo Designs
 * ASIN :B0161G9PZM

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #3,643 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby)  *  #31 inDiaper Bags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars1,162 ratings
feature_bullets: 7-PIECE COMPLETE SET — Includes (1) diaper bag, (2) personal purse w carrying strap, (3) changing pad, (4) accessories bag, (5) organizer bag w mesh top, (6) insulated bottle bag, (7) stroller straps

QUALITY MATERIALS — Made from multilayered fabrics that are waterproof and stain resistant. Easily clean the surface or interior with a wipe. For more serious dirt and stains, machine wash cold and hang dry. All hardware and seams are reinforced for a long lasting bag that still looks new after repeated use.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL — Mix and match the parts of the set for each trip, whether going to daycare, work, or a day out. The main compartment is large enough to fit breast pump, extra diapers, bottles, wipes, etc. Many small pockets make sure you stay organized. The durable and stain resistant material means you don't need to worry about damaging it while on the go. SoHo's Grand Central Station diaper bag is versatile and can keep up with you. Usable as tote, purse, stroller attachment, travel bag.

DESIGNED BY PARENTS FOR PARENTS — Each compartment and set item in this diaper bag set is designed to simplify your life as a parent. One extra large compartment fits your largest items while small pockets ensure you stay organized. SoHo's Grand Central Station Diaper Bag stands upright for easy access to main compartment while changing diapers for your little one. Centrally attached stroller straps lets the diaper bag hang straight down for easy access while attached to a stroller.

12-MONTH WARRANTY & SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – All our bags come with at least a 12-month warranty as we are confident of our bags' quality and workmanship. If you ever have any issues, please reach out and we will make sure to make things right.
